groups.label: Inline Code Detection
groups.description: Configure detection of inline codes (placeholders, tags)

extractAllPairs.description: Extract all key-value pairs for translation.

extractStandalone.description: Extract standalone string values (not part of key-value pairs).

useKeyAsName.description: Use YAML key as the Block name for reference.

useFullKeyPath.description: Use full nested path as the name instead of immediate key.

useCodeFinder.description: Enable inline code detection using regex patterns.

mergeAdjacentCodes.description: Merge adjacent inline codes into a single code element for cleaner segmentation.

moveLeadingAndTrailingCodesToSkeleton.description: Move inline codes at the start/end of segments to skeleton (non-translatable).

escapeExtendedChars.description: Escape extended Unicode characters in output.
